pr_title: Jzhang/bugfix/tdi 43820 migration for odd behavior using jdbc connection

timeline.bodyText:
Better with break 7.4.0 ,
if need to backport to 7.2 latter ,we need change version like breaks="7.2.0" version=7.2.1
timeline.author: wchen-talend
timeline.diffHunk:

              name="NewJDBCConnectionMigrationTask"
              version="7.0.1">
